text: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Patiala is a boarding, co-educational school in Patiala district of Punjab, India. Navodaya Vidyalayas are funded by the Indian Ministry of Human Resources Development. == History == The school was founded in 1989 and is a part of Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas. == Affiliations == The school is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education of India. == Geographic location == JNV Patiala is situated near village Fatehpur Rajputan, Sanaur, Patiala District of Punjab. == References == == External links == * Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti website Category:Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas in Punjab Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:Educational institutions established in 1989 Category:1989 establishments in India
title: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Patiala
